Name: Midnight Rhapsody
About the game: Summary Cyberpunk style! Alternative hexagon puzzle Exquisite animation CG! System Click the mouse to control the jigsaw pieces to pick up or put down, and the mouse wheel rotates the angle of the pieces When the position is correctly placed, it will emit yellow light. When it is rotated to the correct angle, the fragments will be locked and cannot be operated any more. The fine CG in the gallery will be unlocked after passing the customs Character sequence Note: All characters in this work have reached the age of 18 and are adults. 1: Qiu Han/Han Choo 2: Qiuyun/Yun Choo 3: He Jie 4: Shui Jin 5: Xiang Ting 6: Gui Jin 7: Jin Cha 8: Xie Xia/Xia Xie 9: Shanbei 10: Mirin
